description: The costs are not so much different with government assistance because only fertilizers that government supported with subsidized. So assuming that the cost different is only about 10% less than without subsidise

label: Vegetable equipment costs (IDR/ha/year)
description: Only for investement for the first year

label: Vegetable equipment costs with government assistance (IDR/ha/year)
description: The costs are not so much different with government assistance because farmers still need to bare most of the equipment by themeselves. However, they can use the equipment alternately with the goup's member

label: Vegetable machinery costs (IDR/ha/year)
description: Only for investement for the first year. In case the farmer need to purchase machinery by themselves.

Vegetable irrigation costs (IDR/ha/year)
description: Only for investement for the first year. In case the farmer need to purchase irrigation equipment (eg. pipe, water pump, etc.) by themselves.

label: Vegetable irrigation costs with government assistance (IDR/ha/year)
description: Consider that government provide pipes and water pump for each farmer group. However farmers still need to pay forirrigation equipment maintenance cost and fuel.

label: Irrigation maintenance costs to be paid every season to farmers' group or P3A (IDR/year)
description: This is excluded irrigation equipment (pipes, hose, etc) maintenance costs. The payment is only for maintaining the irrigation channels and water pond

Rice cultural value proxy of quality or satisfaction (IDR/kg)
description: We use the difference between common rice price in the region and the most premium/expensive rice in Indonesia

label: Rice cultural value proxy of local identity or pride (IDR/kg)
description: We consider about the future without rice in this region. Then, people need to purchase rice from outside the region with higher price of course, of course including transportation costs)

label: Rice cultural value proxy of local cultural practice (tudang sipulung)
description:
We consider that there are more benefits for farmers If they keep doing this local practice, especially related to the efficiency of crop management. For example: lower cost for crop protection (because with this practice, farmers can arrange the farming schedule together and more efficiently among farmers. And according to farmers, with this, they can manage the season bettter and also avoid high risk of failure due to pest and disease.
So maybe we can estimate that like with this practice, we can expect that the crop management costs (excluding labos costs) can be lower up to 5-10% if compared to without this practice (?) like in vegs farming. So we can use the difference as the value for this, I think...

label: Rice cultural value proxy of local cultural practice (gotong royong)
description: We can estimate this by expecting that the labr costs can be lower up to 10-35% if compared to normal daily wages for vegs farming. So we can also use the difference as the value for this, I think..
